Duke is a **desktop app for managing tasks**. While it is a GUI, it works
similar to a CLI, thus having the best of both worlds.
Tell Duke the tasks you need recorded and their details
Save completed tasks to a separate file and clear them from the list
Showcase all tasks in the list
### `todo` - adds a To-Do to the list
### `deadline` - adds a deadline to the list
### `event` - adds an event to the list
### `delete` - deletes a task from the list
### `archive` - moves all completed tasks to archive
All completed tasks have been moved to the archive.
* Duke is an interactive bot that helps the user to note down important tasks.

* Deadline is a subclass of Task. It is a more specific Task that is a reminder of an important
* due date with its date attached.
* @param details is a String containing information on what the deadline is.
* @param date is a LocalDate object of the date the deadline is due.
* Passes the Deadline object out in readable format.
* @return the readable string giving the Deadline's details.
* Event is a subclass of Task. It is a more specific Task that is a reminder of an important
* @param details is a String containing information on what the event is.
* @param date is a LocalDate object of the date the event will be held.
* Passes the Event object out in readable format.
* @return the readable string giving the Event's details.
* Task is a parent class that represents the different tasks in the list of items that the user noted down.
* @param details the details of the task.
* Sets the status of the task to true to mark that it has been completed.
* Sets the status of the task to false to mark that it hass not been completed.
* Passes the Task object out in readable format.
* @return the readable string giving the Tasks's details.
* Returns the details of the task, including its description and date where possible.
